item.description:
Let's bid farewell to 2011 and welcome 2012 with friends, good food and a drink or two! Let's meet at Rooftop 120 and enjoy the great Happy Hour...tapas and specially priced apps to enjoy. I'll be there at 5pm, but you can come anytime! We can have dinner later or just do the apps and tapas...but come join us for a very special night!!!

http://www.rooftop120.com/food/happy-hourlate-night/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Bidding Farewell to 2011 at Rooftop 120!!!
